name: Alp Consulting
description:
Alp Consulting, one of the leading recruitment and staffing companies of India, is a ISo 9001:2000 certified company and is a subsidiary of Outsourcing Inc. of Japan, a multi-billion-dollar organisation with presence in 17 countries. We are one of the leading companies in developing and delivering talent solutions that are customised according to the specific human capital requirements of organisations. 

Founded in 1996, Alp has worked with more than 400 enterprise clients. We have partnered with more than 20 Fortune 500 companies and most of the leading Indian IT companies. 

With over 500 experienced recruiters, Alp now operates out of eight locations in India and one in Sri Lanka. We service more than 750 client locations in India and via our parent company service more than 21 countries in Aisa, Europe, Americas and Oceania.  

Our services fall under 4 broad categories - Search and Recruitment Solutions, Staffing Solutions, HR Outsourcing and Compliance Solutions and Apprenticeship Management and Training Solutions. We specialize in providing manpower solutions for IT & ITES, Ecommerce and Retail, Pharma & Healthcare, Electronics & Semiconductor, Manufacturing and Energy & Infrastructure sectors.
